name: Popover
tag_list: mobile-web, mobile-social-network, social-gaming, social-games, social-networks, facebook, myspace, widgets, applications, twitter, social-media, web2-0, social-networking, interactive-entertainment, games, start-up, facebook-games, facebook-apps, mobile-
overview:
Popover is the first social gaming company to produce a platform that allows for easily deployable, localized multi-player social games playable in any language across the web and mobile, including iOS, Android, and Windows Mobile. All of Popover’s games are all built with a passion for pixel-perfect design and superior performance with an emphasis on privacy and support. The company’s platform eliminates language barriers and connects players through a localized gaming experience.

Popover is the first cross-cultural, multi-lingual social gaming platform that prides itself in globalizing local heritage games that are significant to specific markets, opening a window into various cultures from around the world. Its first three games are:

  • US Origin: Popover Poker & Bingo Around the World
  • Middle East Origin: Yalla Tarneeb.

Tarneeb is a popular Middle Eastern multi-player card game. Translated as “Trump,” it is a dynamic trick taking game that is massively popular in Middle Eastern countries. Until today, Tarneeb had not been available to play on Facebook. Both Yalla Tarneeb and Popover Poker are available in multiple languages, and are the first social card games to fully support mirrored languages including Arabic and Hebrew.

acquisition.source_description: Playsino Acquires Popover Games and Foghorn Games
